revised_title: Factors Influencing Vision Through Meshes: A Review of Experiments and Findings
tldr: This study investigates the factors affecting vision through mesh screening materials, such as weave characteristics, thread thickness, solid/void ratio, and mesh veiling luminance. The researchers conducted experiments to determine the most significant variables and their interactions, aiming to optimize window screening materials for better visibility and environmental control.
